snippet: Federal prosecutors have dropped an espionage charge against a computer hacker, saying the military document found in his possession was obsolete.         The charge was dropped on Thursday in exchange for a guilty plea to unrelated offenses invol...
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors have dropped an espionage charge against a computer hacker, saying the military document found in his possession was obsolete. The charge was dropped on Thursday in exchange for a guilty plea to unrelated offenses involving unauthorized intrusions into the files of the Pacific Bell Telephone Company.

headline.main: U.S. Drops Case of Spying By Computer
